hypeerweb

Class Connections

  • java.lang.Object
    • hypeerweb.Connections

  • public class Connections
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is contained in a node, and makes it easier to access information about it's owners connections. 
     Domain:
      neighbors                  : Set
      surrogateNeighbors         : Set
      inversesurrogateNeighbors  : Set
      fold                       : Node
      surrogateFold              : Node
      inverseSurrogateFold       : Node
    Author:
    Trevor Bentley

        public Connections()
        The default constructor.
        Precondition:
        None
        Postcondition:
        neighbors, surrogateNeighbors, and inverseSurrogateNeighbors sets are instantiated fold, surrogateFold, and inverseSurrogateFold set to NULL_NODE singleton

      • getChildConnections

        public Connections getChildConnections(Node parent)
        Returns a Connections object will all new connections of child Node
        Parameters:
        parent -
        Returns:
        child's connections
        Precondition:
        method is called by Parent Node
        Postcondition:
        childConnections = - neighbors = parent's inverse surrogate neighbors - surrogate neighbors = parent's neighbors that are bigger than it - fold = parent's fold or inverse surrogate fold

      • parentNotify

        public void parentNotify(Node selfNode)
        Notify all of parent Node's inverse surrogate neighbors that it is no longer their surrogate neighbor. Clears all of parent's inverse surrogate neighbors Sets parent's fold
        Parameters:
        selfNode -
        Precondition:
        parent Node calls parentNotify
        Postcondition:
        all inverse surrogate neighbors are notified that parentNode is no longer their surrogate neighbor

      • childNotify

        public void childNotify(Node childNode,
               Node parentNode)
        Child node notifies all of it's new connections how it is now connected to them: - Fold - Neighbors - Surrogate Neighbors
        Parameters:
        childNode -
        parentNode -
        Precondition:
        childNode has all of its Connections.
        Postcondition:
        all Connections of childNode are notified of new Connection between childNode and Node.

      • disconnect

        public static void disconnect(Node deletionPoint)
        Disconnect Deletion Point from HypeerWeb - Called from the deletionPoint node
        Parameters:
        deletionPoint - - node to disconnect
        Precondition:
        deletionPoint is a valid node in the HypeerWeb, deletionPoint is actually the deletion point
        Postcondition:
        deletionPoint will be disconnected from the HyPeer web

      • replace

        public static void replace(Node selfNode,
           Node deletionPoint)
        Replace selfNode with deletionPoint in the HypeerWeb
        Parameters:
        selfNode - - node to be replaced
        deletionPoint - - node to be replaced with

      • iterateNeighbors

        public void iterateNeighbors(Node node1,
                    Node node2,
                    Connections.Action action)
        Iterate through all neighbors and perform the desired action
        Parameters:
        node1 - - Node to be inserted or removed
        node2 - - NULL_NODE or node that will replace node1
        action - - what action to perform
